title: If I want to choose science and maths in class 11 but I haven't got 80% in class 10, what should I do to choose my stream? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you haven't got 80% in 10th, means you didnt studied hard enough. You might get science, as science stream criteria differ in schools, some school demand atleast 85% whereas some schools are fine with 75% too. If your school give science at 80%, that you haven't got, it is better to give up on science stream, as science is not a joke. But in case you are extremely sincere then it depends on your percentage. If it is atleast 75%, there might be some hope, though it varies as per school and teachers. If it is less than that, yours is a lost case.

First of all marks of 10 doesn't decide your path, but you have to check your marks in maths and science if your marks are good in these subjects and you have intrests in these two subject's then choose these subjects without any hesitation. All the best…. . …
